skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.description: PHP, Laravel, Angular, Vue.js, Ionic, React Native, TypeScript

skills.title: Version Control & Collaboration
skills.description: Proficient with Git and platforms like GitHub and Bitbucket

skills.title: UI/UX
skills.description: Experience with creating user-friendly and visually appealing mobile and web app interfaces

skills.title: Database
skills.description: Familiar with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase

skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Strong knowledge of Vue.js, Angular, and Laravel for building responsive websites and web applications

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: Experience in building RESTful APIs using Laravel, integrating with frontend applications (React, Vue, Ionic)

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description:
Expert in React Native and TypeScript for building scalable and high-performance mobile apps.
Proficient in cross-platform mobile development for both Android and iOS

skills.title: Agile Development & Team Collaboration
skills.description: Leadership experience as a Mobile Team Lead, with a strong focus on collaboration, code quality, and continuous improvement

portfolio.title: Bulletin Board OJT
portfolio.description: Worked on the development of the Bulletin Board project using Laravel for backend and frontend. This project focused on responsive design and public relations features.

portfolio.title: Ionic Learn & Weather App OJT
portfolio.description: Built a Learn & Weather app using Ionic for the frontend, aimed at providing users with weather forecasts and educational content.

portfolio.title: MJCSN Mobile App & API
portfolio.description: Developed a mobile app for MJCSN using Ionic and Laravel for the backend. The app is currently unpublished on the Google Play Store, but has been in development for over a year.

portfolio.title: Lixil Mobile App
portfolio.description: Contributed to the Lixil Mobile App for iOS, built with Ionic, over a 2-month period. This app was designed for Japanese furniture showrooms, enabling users to scan QR codes for discount codes and streamline their shopping experience.

portfolio.title: MJCSN Website
portfolio.description: Worked on the MJCSN website using Vue.js, with a focus on improving the user experience and the overall design.

portfolio.title: Portal Website
portfolio.description: Developed a portal website using Laravel for backend and frontend functionalities over a 3-month period.

portfolio.title: Kyaung Mobile App
portfolio.description: Rewrote the Kyaung app, originally developed in Ionic, into React Native. The app is now available on the Play Store.

portfolio.title: Jewellery OS App
portfolio.description: Developed a jewelry mobile app with React Native, providing an optimized user experience.

portfolio.title: Mega Paint OS App
portfolio.description: Contributed to the Mega Paint OS app using React Native, ensuring smooth functionality and performance.

portfolio.title: Car Buy & Sell App
portfolio.description: Developed a mobile app for buying and selling cars using React Native, designed to provide an efficient platform for automobile enthusiasts.

portfolio.title: uabpay & uabpay+ Mobile Apps
portfolio.description: Developed and maintained the uabpay and uabpay+ mobile apps using React Native, helping users manage their financial transactions easily.
